title: Old Timey Serif Display Font
author: glenwood

comments.content: **[Victorian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121118/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset&ffam=Victorian%20LET%20-%20Regular&fid=ed57d07dd7616fbb1a1d11d27a015a2b&fsize=60&text=Benton%20Lee%E2%80%99s%20Steakhouse&wrap=2)** by Freda Sack [Letraset, 1976-80] - also available by Linotype & ITC
